full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Gel Imaging System

### Reference Number and Amendment Number
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) invites tender submissions for a Gel Imaging System under Supply Arrangement (SA) [2024-00406] with an amendment number 8, published on December 12, 2023.

### Tender Details
* Tender Closing Date: January 18, 2024, at 14:00:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 18, 2024
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2024
* Tender Status: Expired

### Project Overview
The Winnipeg National Centre for Foreign Animal Disease requires a Gel Imaging System for their operations.

### Procurement Method
The procurement method is Competitive - Traditional, where the lowest price will be the selection criterion.

### Contact Information
For any inquiries, please contact:
* Sarah Gervais, sarah.gervais@inspection.gc.ca, 343-549-3749 (phone)

### Supporting Documents
The tender notice and amendment 1 can be downloaded from the following links:
* [English Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27349/cfia_acia-20286524-v1-2024-00406_npp.pdf)
* [French Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/27349/2024-00406-rfp-amendment-001_0.pdf) 

This rewritten text maintains all of the original details while improving clarity and coherence. I reformatted the document into a clear and easy-to-understand structure using markdown format. I removed unnecessary subheadings and used headings to maintain the content's integrity without repetition. Finally, I contextualized the contact information and supporting documents to ensure it was easy to access relevant information. 

### Government Notice Type
This tender notice is a Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement (SA).

### UNSPSC Classification
Chemical evaluation instruments and supplies are classified as UNSPSC code 41113000.

## Procurement Regions
This procurement opportunity covers regions in Canada.

**Please note:** This rewrite assumes an English-speaking audience for simplicity. Translations can be made if necessary.
